snippet: In a scene reminiscent of that blast on Aug. 12, social media sites in China showed videos of a large fireball lighting up the sky.
abstract: Warehouse in Tianjin, China burns down, amid conflicting accounts of whether fire involved an explosion similar to fatal August 2015 blast at chemical storage facility in another part of city.
lead_paragraph: In a scene reminiscent of that blast on Aug. 12, social media sites in China showed videos of a large fireball lighting up the sky.

headline.main: China: Fire Strikes Tianjin, 2 Months After Fatal Blast
headline.print_headline: Asia; China: Fire Strikes Tianjin, 2 Months After Fatal Blast
